title: Nested Flexbox
description: Flex containers inside flex containers for complex layouts.

steps.explanation: Step 1: Create a parent flex container and a nested flex container inside.
steps.css: .parent { display:flex; gap:10px; } .child { display:flex; flex-direction:column; border:1px solid #000; padding:5px; }
steps.hint: Nested flex allows alignment within items of a flex container
